markings: red artist's seal: 伊東 {Itō} | RBC, white publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe}

text: This is an artist’s proof. It is on thinner paper than that generally used for prints, and there is no edition stamp on the back.
title: Early Summer Bath
